title: S16 Ep147: Life After Breath w/Jacob Cooper
itunes:title: Life After Breath w/Jacob Cooper
description:
Darkness Radio presents Life After Breath with guest Jacob Cooper

Jacob’s near-death experience as a child ripped an opening between him and the spirit world. He lived, but was forever changed. As he grew, darkness and light led him on a roller coaster ride of turmoil, loss, discovery, and renewal. Today he shares this mystical journey with those brave enough to explore the “other side,” to try and understand the beings there, and hear the wisdom gleaned. Mr. Cooper faced the question of the hereafter, looked at life lessons, and examined what a connected awareness can mean to the human experience.

Jacob Cooper is a licensed clinical social worker, certified Reiki master, certified hypnotherapist, and best-selling author. Inspired by his own near-death experience, Jacob helps people find new ways to look at death as not an ending but a new beginning through spiritual awareness.

Get his book here: https://amzn.to/3EXuc7i

Visit his website here: www.jacoblcooper.com
